summary:
Mod made in response to a special request in the BethSoft forums.
Mod replaces female armor and clothing showing excessive cleavage with armor and clothing that don\'t.
descriptionHtml:
4/22/2012   #####
A quick note to first apologize to all who have taken the time to send me a message for the late/lack of responses. I have dropped out of the Skyrim community as the game came to bore me rather quickly, and stopped playing it/modding it soon after I released this mod.(to each his own, right?). As I have deleted the game and CS from my computer, I am no longer maintaining this mod at all. So, for those who had kind words for me, thank you. For those who have made requests for further changes, I am sorry I can accommodate your request.
Thanks.
System Shock
#######

Mod made in response to a special request in the BethSoft forums.
Mod replaces female armor and clothing showing excessive cleavage with armor and clothing that don\'t.
Female hide, draugr, bandit, forsworn armor replaced with studded armor.
Female wench, bartender, chef replaced with blacksmith, farmer clothing.

To install:
Decompress modesty.7z
Move meshes directory into ...skyrim/data/
author: System Shock
